com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.root
Class AbstractQueryStatement<DataType,InformerType extends Informer<DataType>>

java.lang.Object
  com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.root.AbstractQueryStatement<DataType,InformerType>
Type Parameters:
DataType -
InformerType -
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueryExpressionContainer, QueryStatement<DataType,InformerType>, Visitable<QueryExpressionContainerVisitor>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollectionQueryStatement
public abstract class AbstractQueryStatement<DataType,InformerType extends Informer<DataType>>
extends Object
implements QueryStatement<DataType,InformerType>

base class for query executable statements. This class simply provides common behaviour, like buildQueryExpression() or a default implementation of #sortBy(SortingExpression)

Author:
ndx

Method Detail

buildQueryExpression

protected QueryExpression buildQueryExpression()
Lazy build query expression from informations about service managed class and input query. Once built, it is memorized in queryExpression. As a consequence, one may not modify the source query expression

Returns:

getId

public String getId()
Description copied from interface: QueryStatement
Provides a String identifying the query. This String can be anything, provided it provides a uniqueness of query : the same query should always have the same id, regardless of its parameters

Specified by:
getId in interface QueryStatement<DataType,InformerType extends Informer<DataType>>
